column2: If projected  the data must be understandable.
The product shall respond fast to keep up-to-date data in the display.
The system shall have a MDI form that allows for the viewing of the graph and the data table.
The Disputes System must prevent users from accessing any dispute cases that do not belong to their cardholder base.
The Disputes System will facilitate direct data entry of a dispute case via a user interface that supports real time responses to the users.
The Disputes System must provide different levels of access with regard to disputes case initiation and follow-up actions.
The Disputes System will provide the user the ability to create or initiate a ticket retrieval request.
The three types of ticket retrieval requests are (1) Request for original receipt (2) Request for a copy of the receipt or (3) Request for a portfolio.

The chargeback request results in a printed chargeback notification that is sent to merchant indicating that their account will be charged back if no proof is provided that the disputed transaction is valid.
The Disputes System must provide a confirmation to the user upon the creation of a chargeback request.
The confirmation must contain the following information; the dispute case number  the type of chargeback requested (pending or immediate)  and the date that the merchant response is due.
The Disputes System must provide Search functionality.
The Disputes System shall provide the users the ability to view the history of all activities that have occurred on the dispute case.
Upon the next logon the user that initiated the dispute case must be notified that a systematic action has occurred on the dispute case.
The product shall comply with corporate color scheme
The search for recycled parts shall take no longer than 15 seconds.
The preferred repair facility is returned within 8 seconds
The product shall be able to handle up to 1500 simultaneous users.
For estimators  the product shall be able to be operated in a repair facility during dirty and noisy conditions.
The product shall interface with the ChoiceParts system once per day at approximately 1:00 AM.
Product installations and upgrades shall be handled by the middleware technology team within established launch time frames.
Only adjusters can request recycled parts audit reports.
Only adjusters with a supervisor role can update preferred repair facility ratings.
Only collision estimators shall search for recycled parts.
The system shall prevent malicious attacks including denial of service.
The product shall comply with the estimatics laws relating to recycled parts usage.
The vehicle data shall include vehicle year  make  and model
The system shall resolve the zipcode for the street address  city  and state if zipcode is unknown.
The preferred repair facility shall be returned to the user.
The estimator shall search by zipcode with a radius of 30 miles if no parts are found for the preferred parts suppliers
The estimator shall apply selected recycled parts to the collision estimate.
The estimator shall not apply recycled parts to the collision estimate if no available parts are returned.
The adjuster shall review the collision estimate.
The system shall generate an audit report based on the available recycled parts and the collision estimate.
The audit report shall include the number of available recycled parts from the original search results.
The audit report shall be available to other adjusters at later points in time.
The current repair facility ratings shall be displayed to the user.
The system will display a blank set of ratings if there are not ratings yet defined.
The ratings shall include categories for attempted use of recycled parts and actual use of recycled parts
The product shall be easy to use.
The product shall give users feedback when necessary.
The product shall allow the user to select a chosen language from one of the target market countries.
The product shall allow for intuitive searching of available conference rooms.
Aside from server failure  the software product shall achieve 99.99% up time.
The concurrency capacity must be able to handle peak scheduling times such as early morning and late afternoon hours.
The product shall be expected to operate for at least 5 years for each customer installation.
The product shall transmit data between the user and the product without problems.
80% of end users are able to integrate new database management systems with the product without changing the product is software code.
Every registered user will have access to the product is support site via the Internet.
70% of registered users shall find a solution to their problem within 5 minutes of using the support site.
The customer shall be able to easily integrate new building maps with the product throughout the product is lifecycle.
The product shall be translated into foreign languages other than the target market countries i languages in future releases.
The product is expected to integrate with multiple database management systems.
Each conference room reservation in the system will contain the same information as was entered by the user.
The product shall prevent the input of malicious data.
90% of survey respondents from each target market country will find that the date and time formatting of the product is correct.
The product will notify employees of meeting invitations.
The product shall assign the organizers contact information to each meeting they create.
The product will be able to delete conference rooms.
The product will update existing room equipment.
The product shall allow an organizer to invite other employees to meetings.
Each time a conference room is reserved  the conference room schedule shall be updated to reflect the time and date of the reservation.
The product shall record updated meeting agendas.
The product shall display conference rooms according to search parameters.
The product shall record different meeting types.
The product shall notify building personnel of equipment transport requests.
The product will display an available status for unreserved conference rooms.
The System shall utilize currently owned computer equipment.
The System shall be able to automatically backup business data and restore them on demand.
The System shall maintain consistent security.
It should be possible to assign access rights to all subsystems independently.
The System shall meet all applicable accounting standards.
The System shall allow generation of Inventory Quantity Adjustment documents on demand.
The System shall allow entering  storing and modifying product formulas.
Product formulas shall allow use of semi-products  which have own formulas.
Product formula substitutionary ingredients shall be entered automatically by the PFE subsystem.
Product shall allow entering  storing and modifying product menus used by POS terminals.
The System shall generate Inventory Quantity Adjustment document automatically when daily Product Sales data is available.
Administrator shall be able to activate a pre-paid card via the Administration section in under 5 seconds.
Customer shall be able to check the status of their prepaid card  by entering in the PIN number  in under 5 seconds.
Database will mark the account as inactive  and user will not be able to log into the website.
System shall let administrator de-activate a customer account in under 1 minute.
Customer will no longer be able to access the website.
Entered movie information will be stored in the database and will now be available on the website.
The website should have an African feel  but should not alienate non-Africans.
The website should use animation on pages which are describing the services  to grab the users attention and encourage them to sign up.
The website design should be modern  clean  and concise.
The website will use standard Internet conventions when interacting with the user.
When purchasing a streaming movie or pre-paid card via credit card  the processing time should have a maximum response time of 15 seconds.
The website shall continue to operate if the payment gateway goes down.
The streaming server will support a maximum of 700 movies; new servers can be added to support more movies.
The product shall be expected to operate within the maximum maintenance budget for a minimum of 2 years.
All aspects of the website shall be accessed by a web browser over the Internet.
The same hardware supporting the current website will be used to support the new system.
Movies shall be encoded for 56k and 256k streams.
Promotional updates to the website should take a day to update.
Izogn Administrator must be able to add new products to the website within 2 minutes.
The product shall be able to be installed in the specified environment within 1 working day.
The website shall prevent its data from being corrupted when incorrect data is entered in.
All customer information will be stored on a secure database  accessible only to authorized personnel.
All credit card information will be encrypted in the database.
The website shall not be offensive to religious or ethnic groups.
The website should use Flash to provide animation on the home page.
IzognMovies shall meet the licensing requirements set forth by the appropriate organizations in order to stream African movies.
The PHP code will comply with PEAR standards.
Website shall allow customers to add their own movie review for a selected movie.
System shall automatically update the main page of the website every Friday  and show the 4 latest movies that have been added to the website.
Movies can only be streamed if the customer has purchased a movie  and is within the 2-day time period to stream the movie.
All streaming movie sales will be logged in the database  and accessible by the administrator.
Total lead cycle time must be completed in 5 minutes for 90% of lead volume between the business hours of 8AM CST to 8PM CST; then 3 minutes for 99% of lead volume during off business hours.
The washing process must use a non binding  neutral data format  such as xml  when receiving and processing lead data.
Defect reports will be available to technical units on a 24x7 basis.
Washing parameters will be updated during scheduled maintenance hours.
The vendor will verify the invalid lead.
Vendor will submit a credit validation record to be applied to the enterprise billing system.
The leads washing functionality will insert all leads captured by the web service.
If the leads score falls within the medium average then it will be set for manual verification by an Enrollment Coordinator through the eleads system.
The leads washing functionality will compile both contact and academic scoring information for a total score.
Prior to submitting the lead to the enterprise system the leads washing functionality will assign the lead to an admissions rep.
When the offensive player takes a shot  the product shall simulate the sound of a ship at sea.
The product shall be intuitive and self-explanatory.
The product shall be available to players who understand English  Spanish and French.
The product shall provide players no access to information that might reveal the identity of another player
The product shall maintain a list of players.
The product shall allow a user to remove himself or herself from the list of players at any time.
The product shall make inactive players unavailable for selection from the list of players.
The product shall remove players who have been inactive for 24 hours from the list of players.
The product shall allow a player to initiate a game by selecting another available player from the list of players.
Once a game is initiated  the product shall allow each player to position their 5 ships on their respective defensive grids.
The product shall allow a player to position ships horizontally on their grid.
The product shall allow the player to position ships vertically on their grid.
The product shall allow the player to position ships diagonally on their grid
The product shall prevent the player from overlapping ships on their grid.
When both players have positioned their 5 ships on their defensive grids  the product shall define the status of each player for the first turn.
For each turn  the product shall identify one player as offensive status and one player as defensive status.
At the start of each turn  the product shall notify each player of his or her status.
For each shot  the product shall examine the defensive grid of the defensive player to determine whether the shot was a hit or miss.
For each shot  the product shall notify the players whether the shot was a hit or miss.
When a game is ended  the product shall notify the players that the game is ended.
When a game is ended  the product shall allow each player to identify himself or herself as an available player in the list of players.
The system shall have high availability every day of the year.The system must be available for use between 12:00AM and 6:00PM all days of the year.
The system must be available for use between 7:00AM and 11:59PM all days of the year.
The product shall ensure that only supervisors can enter a caller is schedule.The product must ensure that supervisors are allowed to access advertise empty time slots.
In the interface and usability survey  90% of beta testers must report that the interface is adequately simple.
The interface shall be appealing to callers and supervisors.
The product shall provide Monitoring Services.The product shall be easy for System Administrators and DBAs to use after two weeks of usage.
The product shall provide Portals.The product shall help System Administrators to analyze the transactions with ad-hoc reporting and KPIs (Key Performance Indicators)
The product shall provide Asynchronous Messaging.The product shall provide asynchronous messaging to enable parallel processing and reduce the overhead in communications
The product shall poll the system for messages every second.The product shall poll the system for new messages at a maximum of every 1 second.
The product shall be available 99% of the time.
The product shall operate with every platform.The product shall accommodate any new technology without any change in its architecture.
The system shall use IBM and CCR branding standards.
The system interface shall be formatted to display at 800 by 600 pixel resolution.
90% of users should be able to successfully use the system to generate a report on their first use.
Rreports must be easy to generate.
eports must be generated within one button click and exported within one button click (after selecting the report)
After one use a user should understand and remember 90% of the system usage and navigation.
All CCR users shall receive training before the WCS system is deployed.
One training session will be held for 100% of CCR users before system deployment (based on a CCR user being available)
The WCS system shall use appropriate nomenclature and terminology as defined by the Corporate Community Grants organization.
The WCS system must run queries to the WCS databases once again (on a specified day) to update the available data available to CCR users.
All changes  updates  and additions to the WCS system shall be updated in the WCS Developer and WCS User Guides.
The Commissioner will be the only authorized user per league to adjust league settings.
Each page shall contain a similar format with action items in one location and navigation buttons in a different location.
The message board shall contain the 5 most recently posted messages on the league page.
The application shall ask the user to confirm dropping a player or trading a player before performing the action.
The application shall have a downtime of at most 10 minutes per year.
The application shall run on a web application server.
All transaction details must be obtained from the Statement Database
The system shall achieve 95% up time.
The system shall have a professional appearance
The product shall have a consistent color scheme and fonts.
The system shall be intuitive and self explanatory.
The product shall be easy for a realtor to learn.
The product shall synchronize with the office system every hour.
The product shall operate in offline mode whenever internet connection is unavailable.
The product shall be installed by an untrained realtor   without recourse to separately-printed instructions.
The product is expected to run on Windows CE and Palm operating systems.
Only registered realtors shall be able to access the system.
The system shall allow a real estate agent to query MLS information
The system shall cater to 10 simultaneous users from 9am to 5pm.
A secondary database will be used to store historical statistics and data.
The system shall be able to call the seller or buyer to schedule an appointment
The system shall be easy to use by the Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members.
All of the users shall be able to use the system after one day of training.
The verbiage used within the system shall be consistent with Standard English and the terminology of the national Nursing Community.
Staff members shall be able to complete a set of tasks in a timely manner.
The system shall interface with the faculty central server.
